meaningMnemonic: With your <radical>fingers</radical> you put some <radical>weapon</radical>s in a <radical>boat</radical> for <kanji>transport</kanji>. This is a transport boat and its your job to get these weapons from one place to another.
readingMnemonic: Hey! You're <kanji>transport</kanji>ing weapons just like <reading>Han</reading> (はん) Solo! I mean, it was a spaceship, not technically a boat, but he definitely used the Millennium Falcon as a transport.
